FINISH
Looks like Picasso had a rough day!
Is this a drawing or a modern art statement? Either way, I\'m confused!
I didn\'t know stick figures could have such deep emotions!
This is what happens when you let a cat hold the pencil!
Did you use a potato for inspiration? Because this is a-peeling!
If this was a treasure map, I\'d be lost for sure!
I see you\'re going for the \'abstract\'; look. Mission accomplished!
Is this a drawing or a game of Pictionary gone wrong?
I can see the effort… right next to the confusion!
This masterpiece is brought to you by the letter \'W\' for \'What is that?\'
Not bad! Just a few more practice sessions and you might rival Picasso!
Almost there! With a little more practice, you\'ll be the next Van Gogh—minus the ear incident!
Good effort! Just remember, even the best artists had their \'meh\' days!
Solid attempt! Just think of this as your warm-up sketch for greatness!
You\'re on the right track! Just a few more strokes and you\'ll be a legend!
Nice try! With a little more practice, you\'ll be drawing like a pro in no time!
Great start! Just remember, every masterpiece begins with a little chaos!
Not too shabby! Keep at it, and soon you\'ll be the talk of the art world!
Good job! Just think of this as a stepping stone to your future art career!
You\'ve got potential! With a bit more doodling, you\'ll be unstoppable!
Wow, did you just summon the spirit of Michelangelo?
This is so good, I\'m convinced you have a secret art degree!
If this was a competition, you\'d be the reigning champion of awesomeness!
Is this a drawing or a portal to another dimension? Because I\'m ready to step through!
You\'ve officially raised the bar! I\'m going to need a ladder to reach it!
This is so impressive, I\'m pretty sure it just became the new Mona Lisa!
If this were a food, it would be a gourmet meal—deliciously artistic!
You\'ve got skills! I\'m starting to think you might be a wizard with that pencil!
This drawing deserves its own fan club! Can I be the president?
Is there a gallery nearby? Because this masterpiece needs to be on display!
